nodes.bodyText: Is this per HIPPA or another regulation? If yes, it would be great to leave a comment linking to it.

Yes, but we probably want to avoid certifying a config as HIPAA or following HIPAA formally in the configs for now. Let's revisit this once we formally try to certify our templates later or work with solutions team to clarify in whitepaper, etc.

Right, but I meant as a pointer to why this value. Otherwise 7 years seems somewhat arbitrary.
The comment can say something like, "Per HIPPAA recommendations, set this to 7 years."
